speaker: Alex
text: *Alex can't contain his grin.* You won't believe this, Mary. I got a job offer from SoftCorp. They want me as an AI engineer!

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary raises her eyebrows.* Wow, Alex! That's a fantastic opportunity! I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a little envious.

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex chuckles.* Don't worry, I'll be sure to put in a good word for you once I've established a solid reputation there. I can't think of anyone else I'd rather work with.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary smiles.* I appreciate that, Alex. Let's see where God leads us, right?
